name: The Man with a Yellow Gun
name_original: The Man with a Yellow Gun
description:
A simple 2D infinite runner, where you jump, shoot and slide across buildings.

How to Reload?

Jump ---> Tap Slide

Control scheme:
Keyboard:
Shoot-Z, V or Left Mouse Button
Jump: Space
Slide: Down arrow key or S

Controller:
Shoot: West and North buttons
Jump: East and South buttons
Slide: Down on the D-pad and Left analogue stick
